website_summaries.verdict: Great for a long day spent skiing or tromping around in cold, snowy or muddy conditions, but you will likely have cold toes.
pros: These knee-high socks provide up to 6 hours of consistent heat
Top of sock, and its battery compartment pocket, reach higher than the top of most ski and mountain boots
Three heat settings help manage power output and comfort
cons: Warming coils only reach the tops of the feet, leaving toes cold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Ski Season
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for skiing and was initially fearful that they wouldn’t fit above my boots or around my thick calves but they’re prefect, warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ShoshTrvls

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: Socks are really nice. I charged the batteries overnight. They heated up really fast though. I then put on the lowest setting and they stayed warm for a little over 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet from getting cold. Controls are difficult to access through 4 layers of insulation, but not impossible. Ill be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: dishpropat

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and I. We took them to Banff, Canada and used them while skiing at Lake Louis in 5 degree weather. They are great!! We kept them on the lowest level (green) and our feet were warm all day. A great investment. I don't know what you have to do to put them on medium or high but if they keep you warm in 5 degree weather then they are great.
customer_reviews.author: lolo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these socks I had to get a second pair...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these socks as my feet are always cold. These keep your feet warm for many hours and easy to turn on, charge and plug in to connect the batteries. I found they take about 5 minutes to get really warm then have to dial back from there. Wish I had these when my kids were younger and playing football. Those cheap charcoal things never helped and these would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Leips63

customer_reviews.title: Keep your feet toasty warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love to spend time out in nature but have bad circulation to my hands and feet and so they're always cold. These socks really keep my feet toasty. I've only used them once so far, but very happy with the performance. I think the low heat setting is sufficient for me, and that makes them stay warm longer which is nice. My only criticism is the battery being in the sock can be a bit uncomfy depending on placement. But there has to be a way to make these warm. Also, the box is super cute so this makes for a great gift! My picture is of the box because I was pleasantly surprised with the box and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Paulinski

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick, heavy weight material
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the thickness of the material. It is plush enough to absorb the heating elements - so they are not so noticeable. Packaging was nice. Instructions are clear enough for me...it's not rocket science. I wore them for a morning testing them...(it's not cold enough outside yet)...kept my feet noticeably warm on low, could feel a definite surge in heat when mid was selected and again to high. Will keep my toes toasty this winter! Good value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: RHom

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. My feet freeze when hunting so I splurged and got these. Know they only last about one days worth of hunting so don’t forget to charge. I learned the first day too, make sure you pull them all the way up. If it is close to my boots, the battery will come unplugged. But once I pulled them as high as possible haven’t had issue since. Only thing I wish was if the battery was a little smaller. Made it thru this year, hope they still work next.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought they were
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a heated sock that had heat the length of the sock and on the bottom of the foot. While the quality of these socks are good, they are probably a bit think to put inside anything except a slipper or boot too large for the wearer normally. The photo was deceiving- I should have look closer because the only heat these put out are on the top of the foot- nowhere else. I did return them but the return was easy and timely.
customer_reviews.author: Lyfeizgudd

customer_reviews.title: Great socks - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks and highly recommended! Just the right amount of warmth controllable from the battery. Long press to turn on them just quickly press to cycle through settings. High (red light), medium (yellow light) and low ( green light(. Comes with a double battery charger as well so you can charge both batteries at the same time. Very comfortable to wear and after a few minutes you even forget the batteries are even there (outside if the upper calf in a pocket on the docks). Great socks for cold weather activities like hunting or snowshoeing it shoveling - anytime your feet are cold really!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Singer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality socks but only warm by the top of toes.
customer_reviews.text: So as the headline states, they are comfortable, quality socks, but unfortunately, they only heat on the top of foot by the toes. They were warm but not really that hot. I plan on using them for skiing and was worried they wouldn't be long enough to go outside the ski boot. Tried them on and the battery stays outside the top of the boot with some extra space. Overall, they are good socks although I wouldn't say they're particularly that hot. Will update after I ski with them.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoors...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and these socks were a waste of money. I wore them in the woods on a cold day (36). I turned them on when my toes started to get really cold and I couldn’t even feel the warmth on any setting except the “red” setting. They didn’t heat my toes to warm but they did prevent my toes from being uncomfortably cold - which would have been okay if it lasted more than 25 minutes, tried them again the very next day outdoors and the same exact thing - had to be on red and lasted just about a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Warm socks
customer_reviews.text: Three settings to keep your feet warm. Includes rechargeable batteries to power them
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Cancer ward
customer_reviews.text: My Husband is going through Chemo and one of the side effects is that he is extremely sensitive to the cold. If he does not stay warm it could cause nerve damage. These socks are a game changer. We took them to the Hospital on his chemo day and they kept him warm for the 6 hours he was there. The only drawback is that we cannot find replacement batteries that are like the original. Having backup batteries available would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: No Heat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pair for myself and my wife. The socks are well made and very comfortable. They fit well and feel good in my boots. However, I was not able to detect any heating effect at all. I charged the batteries for 12 hours per the instructions. I wore the socks for over an hour on the high setting. Nothing. I tried all the batteries and all the socks but could not detect any heating what so ever. I am returning them. It was a waste of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside often. He constantly has cold feet. He LOVES these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Noelleyb

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! Someone came up with a pair of heated socks that don't require a "D" cell battery! I have used heated socks for a couple of years and I found that the only drawback was trying to stuff a big 'ole battery into my hunting pants. Those days are over and the rechargeable battery on these makes them even better.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Davison

customer_reviews.title: Warmer than most
customer_reviews.text: The socks are warmer and well built, The batteries are not long lasting but good for a few hours. I use them while I work and am sitting still a lot. They keep my feet warmer. Edit: It has been almost a year now and I am still using these socks and the seller sends batteries if those you got fail, so I am pretty happy camper (:
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for deer hunting season for my 11 year old son. They don't heat up enough to even feel the warmth in the boot. Don't waste your money. I'm returning them. He wore them in 20 degree weather and couldn't feel any warmth from them. I plugged them in at home and put them in my slippers, still not much heat from them.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan, Noah, Dad

customer_reviews.title: Produces quite a bit of heat
customer_reviews.text: The socks are a comfortable and provide a good amount of heat. The only issue that I have is that they do not fit in my snowboarding boots. I have a size 11 K2 boot and the battery pack sits too low for me to get my boot as tight as I would like them to be with the socks on. They fit good in my winter boots as they have a lower ankle. I am looking forward to using them next hunting season
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I took these out today for their test run. Riding my motorcycle to the storage unit over an hour away in 40 degree temperatures. After reading the reviews I started them out on high for a few minutes and then considering my activity decided to switch to yellow for the ride. My feet stayed warm for the entire ride. Not even a chill. They were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Brekke

customer_reviews.title: Socks work great
customer_reviews.text: Just wore the socks in CO for 5 days of skiing in 30 degree weather. Put them on low and they lasted all day. Never once thought about my feet, which normally ache in the cold. Not sure if low would be enough to last all day on those few -5 degree days. I will probably buy a second set so that I can use both sets of batteries on super cold days and to swap the socks out for washing. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: These are not heated socks
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this pair of socks for skiing, first of all they are not long enough to fit outside my ski boots. Meaning, I will not be able to close my ski boots because the battery pocket is in the way. Also charged these for a few hours almost 10 hours, wore them just around the house, itheydid not warm up at all, I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Gran Via

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my always cold feet!
customer_reviews.text: These socks have battery packs that are easy to charge and plug right into the socks. I charged them up and slipped the socks on. The warmth they provide is awesome! I plan to wear them regularly and turn them on before going outside or even once I'm back in my office as I have trouble with my feet warming up!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Charge before use
customer_reviews.text: Socks warm and comfy even without the heater on. Awesome and warm in the deer stand. Tip put them on so that the batteries are on each outside legs Otherwise they will rib together on inside of keg and also be painful after walking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow absolutely needed in winter time...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and although there are alot here on amazon, I have to say this was the first that I was able to find that had an option for size. The quality is spot on and they heat up very quick... I've had them on all day and at least at work the batteries are still going providing a nice heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Doesnt get quite as hot as I would have expected, but certainly gets very warm. Easy to charge up the batteries and place them in the socks. There is a special compartment in the socks for the batteries to fit in. Works very well. A little on the expensive side, but considering that they do the job, I cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and warmth
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to try these out at the ice rink. So far I charged them overnight and they are working great. The tops of my feet are very warm. The quality of the socks themselves are better than expected. The material is thick and stretchy. These are going to be great for the upcoming Michigan winter.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm heated socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife as she always complains about cold feet and she loves them. She says these socks keep her feet almost all night long. These socks come with 3 different heat settings high, medium and low. The charger comes with dual ports so the pair can be charged simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Nagavelli

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, and so far, good material used in making them
customer_reviews.text: At first I charged the batteries fully. Put them in and turned them on.. I thought they weren't all that warm. However, my wife, the recipient loves them. Only 4 stars because there is no element on the bottom side, and the heat doesn't penetrate all that well before the rest of her foot is too hot. Her chronic cold foot syndrome is better, but not as good as it was expected per advertised. Worth the $ with rechargeable batteries rather than AAA, C, D or 9volt replacement costs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but the battery just doesn't last that long the heat settings are low, med, and high. Although the heat in high feels like low. Not too strong. Sucks that you cant wash them either. The battery life ends quickly and takes forever to recharge. Probably better off getting one of this things that plugs in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for price
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked these socks for hunting. They lasted al day on low. Only downfall was the the battery pack is in the sock which was not convenient. For the price they are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kati S

customer_reviews.title: Only gets a tiny bit warm
customer_reviews.text: After charging for 12hours and using the socks they just a tiny bit warm when being used on high. The socks are a nice pair of socks, they just don't seem to work well at all, maybe I have a bad set of batteries? My toes and feet remained very cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I cant use the 2 highest settings...
customer_reviews.text: The two highest settings will burn your feet up. Treat them like a crock pot... low and slow. Used them while hunting in 13 degree weather in Montana... They did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Judy

customer_reviews.title: Socks work
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a family member who has very cold feet due to a medical issue. They said that their feet haven’t felt very warm in years till they wore these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Thewalls

customer_reviews.title: Heat only on the top of the foot
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t get as hot as I thought they would. I have icy cold feet due to medical condition (Renault’s syndrome) they did help but the heat was inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: long battery, great vibrations!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great when I hunt penguins. Often I am on the ice shelf waiting for the most opportune time to hunt these birds. I am in Nome AK and the temps are extreme. These socks keep my toes crispy and well doe like a juicy steak. I highly endorse this. I am super happy and will order more for the kids so they do not complain as they hunt the penguins.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The battery died fast
customer_reviews.text: This socks really keep warm which is a good thing to know but the battery died very fast ? I only wear this socks about a haft hour and that the reason why I returned the socks.
customer_reviews.author: james king

customer_reviews.title: A must if you get cold feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 1/2 mens and these fit perfect. I have used them about 4 times now, and they work well, I only wish the battery would last a little longer. I get about 3 - 4 hours on full heat with a full charge. In really cold weather you need them on full heat. If you had an extra set of batteries they would last most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: They don't work!
customer_reviews.text: These sox don't heat up!!! We have 2 pair $85 worth of worthless technology which are being returned. AND the filaments are only on the top of your feet, which don't heat up!!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cielak

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Socks
customer_reviews.text: Not too hot but fo there job the fact that they are above the calf, thick, comfortable are a pluses and the facts that they have 3 levek of temperature makes them super
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Y.

customer_reviews.title: Warm anf Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Used these this month in NE Iowa where morning temps were around °5 with highs in the 20's. These socks worked great. Stated battery life is about right Happy with this purchase !!
customer_reviews.author: James Green

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive but these did not keep feet warm. Cold temps weren't extreme. I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hanna

customer_reviews.title: They are fine.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are fine but I would prefer the heating element to be under the toes instead of on top of them. That is what the socks I previously had and I feel they worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is uncomfortable against your ankle.if you wear a rubber boots you can’t reach the on off switch unless you pull the boot off
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Socks didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Socks warmed the top of foot but it didn’t warm bottom of feet or toes. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son needed for his deployment to Finland. Warm enough for being outside all day in sub-zero temps.
customer_reviews.author: queen.b

customer_reviews.title: Great until they stop holding heat
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were great until one of the batteries would only hold heat for a couple hours. We returned them and got another pair. Same thing happened with the second pair. Now the return window is closed and can’t return the second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got these socks for a Christmas gift. My hubby works outside and socks are always in Christmas list. I don’t know how long these kind of socks available in the market but I should have bought them for a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: SShere

customer_reviews.title: Finally my feet are warm
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't hunt or do much hiking but I do enjoy going to the theater those large buildings are not very warm and my feet freeze so I put these on under my cute boots and my toes stay very toasty so I can enjoy the play
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Life savers!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I use them biking in the cold, and now my feet aren't frozen! (They don't feel too hot if you just wear them in the house without shoes, but contain the heat with shoes and go outside, and it is night and day!)
customer_reviews.author: R. D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend. Pricey, but she loves them. Works great, long lasting charge. Gets toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Keep your feet from getting too cold while hunting with cheap boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Toasty
customer_reviews.text: We drove from Illinois to Florida starting on New Years Day and the cold air in the motor coach when we started our trip always seems to settle at my feet. The sox kept my feet warm and provided compression for circulation.
customer_reviews.author: milhouse

customer_reviews.title: They really don't work very well
customer_reviews.text: These socks barely keep my feet warmer than just wearing normal socks. I went to return them but the window closed yesterday. They are really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Landry

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband coaches my son’s hockey team and these keep his feet warm while on the bench.
customer_reviews.author: MelHus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These socks provided zero heat. They were fully charged and turned onto the highest setting. Waste of money but fortunately was able to return them
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great hunting sock, buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these socks, I got them and was very surprised at how well they heated.. don’t hesitate to buy these if your a hunter and are looking to keep your feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet!
customer_reviews.text: Hello bought socks for a gift to my husband. He just informed me after charging the batteries that one doesn't work at all. And the other one is slightly damaged. No refund just a replacement battery thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Tested these out and they work great the perfect gift for the hubby he’ll be very happy now I’m going to order for myself too
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but may need to exchange
customer_reviews.text: I am going to probably return these and buy a new pair one of the socks only gets warm I like them but one of the socks was defective
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Work for jogging
customer_reviews.text: I jog throughout the winter and have a mild case of Raynauds. I chose these because the heating element is on the top and would not get pounded by the jogging. I've been using them for about 3 months and they are keeping my feet warm and comfortable for this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: Use these around the house in the winter and I love them. No more cold feet.
customer_reviews.author: moonmama

customer_reviews.title: Must have on cold hunting days!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the recipient absolutely loves them for hunting!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Rene Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Mild warmth
customer_reviews.text: These don’t heat enough. I’m unsure if my piece was defective but it only gave mild warmth when I tried indoors. I ultimately returned it next day.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: They are okay, my toes still got cold in my muck boots, and battery only lasts a few hourse
customer_reviews.text: They are okay, need warmth by my toes though not my heels
customer_reviews.author: Erin Baker

customer_reviews.title: good for cold feet
customer_reviews.text: The socks are too tight around the top. I only weigh 125, so I am not a big person and my calves are not big, but the socks are very uncomfortable at the top. The elastic needs to have a lot more give to it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hardly-a-tech

customer_reviews.title: Don't burn you feet with them!
customer_reviews.text: Truly does keep your feet warm. I used them all hunting season this season and my feet never got cold and only set them on medium heat. Only thing I didn't like about them is the little pocket where you put the battery and wire into was a little uncomfortable against my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not all people used them only for coleather. Some of us ha naturally cold feet.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, but the only problem is they only heat top of foot. My feet are usually cold on the bottom. I don’t stand in them. I used them to keep my feet warm while lying in bed or the recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Segura, 6124

customer_reviews.title: Kept my husband's feet warm
customer_reviews.text: So far the socks were used only once by my husband and they worked as described. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Not great for ski boots
customer_reviews.text: These heated well but are not great fir skiing because they do not heat the for t of the toes which for me is the coldest part of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cannot feel the Heat
customer_reviews.text: Used them for skiing over the holidays and went back to me normal ski socks. Batteries would charge and then barely last and I did not get any benefit from them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Missing battery. Cannot seem to get customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Socks appear to be well made but since I was only shipped one battery instead of two, I may never know how well they work. As of now, a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They work great, I did have to turn them down to be on low. Battery lasts about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son when he is out hunting. They worked great the first time he wore them. The next time he went out, they would not heat. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: They don’t really work when it freezing cold
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work below 24 degrees f. I was expecting these to at less somewhat work but I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Branden Haverland

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable and warm !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the socks for my husband. He loves to fly fishing all day long on the river so he was looking for warm socks, and they work great, highly recommended to everybody, comfortable, soft and cozy, easy to use, wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: artur nowak

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be working great. After a month, I’ve used them four times and have yet to run out a charge. I recharge after each use and i’m extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave them three of a 10
customer_reviews.text: It’s a comfortable sock but your feet sweat very easy on them also hard to access to change temperature
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Work excellent for hunting 4-5 hours, plowing driveway on 4wheeler. Start out on high 10-15 minutes lower temperature Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside workers
customer_reviews.text: Really helped keep me warm it does last 3 hours
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: sure didn't heat very timrely and didn't work according to the description in the sales ad
customer_reviews.author: Thomas from penna.

customer_reviews.title: Works good!! Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great keeps my wife's feet warm well below freezing
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok not as warm as I would like but takes the edge off of the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Baston

customer_reviews.title: If you feel cold in winter best thing that you can do is to buy this socks
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mother .. she is satisfied..she do not love cold weather and now she is happy with this socks
customer_reviews.author: Gulcin Dag

customer_reviews.title: Was not comfortable, too small
customer_reviews.text: The heated socks work fine but are too tight. I am returning an will have to purchase a different brand which is larger
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I work in a lift in the northern suburbs of Chicago. These keep my feet warm!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: NOPE......
customer_reviews.text: Tried these this morning while I was hunting. Not warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Genis

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm! Made my feet sweat! Battery life is good. I preferred to keep them on low so my feet didn’t get sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad as a Christmas present! He loved them when they worked. After one month of use 1 sock no longer heats. You think for $45 they would work longer than a month!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pair for my old man that works outdoors. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: brandy collier

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Heating element is only on the top of the foot but this is standard for mid range price electric socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do what they say they do
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, the wife loves them and won't take them off
customer_reviews.author: Kitzy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, battery life diesnt last to long and on low seating it's hard to tell its on
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit with hunting boots.
customer_reviews.text: Could not wear these with snow or hunting boots. Battery was in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Polman

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: The socks lasted only one hour on the lowest setting. I ended up returning them. Buyer beware. Even if they did work as advertised they are hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus S. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: they dont get hot enough to warm up my feet , and they shut off after 1 hour of , and broke after third use
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.
